title: Consumer Rights Act 2022 (No. 37 of 2022), other than section 161, shall
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Consumer Rights Act 2022
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Consumer Rights Act 2022 

(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited consumer right act 2022 (commencement) order 2022

title: Consumer Rights Act 2022 (No. 37 of 2022), other than section 161, shall
heading: 2. The 29th day of November 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 29th day of November 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
Consumer Rights Act 2022 (No. 37 of 2022), other than section 161, shall 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 November, 2022. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [596] 3
